Use this page to track your progress and keep a log of your contributions to the project, please update this each time you work on your project, it is generally a good habit to adopt.

If you are working as a team, at the end, you can duplicate the project and add it to your individual portfolio websites. If you do, you **MUST** retain attribution to your teammates. Removing attribution would constitute plagiarism.
